title: Mom Sends Groceries
flavor: Your mom drops by with bags of groceries and leftover casseroles.

title: Rent Is Due
flavor: The first of the month hits and your landlord wants every last cent.

title: Quiet Night Reading
flavor: You curl up with a stack of books, highlighter in hand, and get lost for hours.

title: Roommate Drama
flavor: Your roommate forgets to do dishes again and the argument derails your focus.

title: Side Hustle Payout
flavor: You finish a small freelance job and finally get paid for your skills.

title: Streaming Spiral
flavor: One episode turns into five and your to-do list just stares back at you.

title: Big Cook-Up
flavor: You meal-prep a giant pot of something cheap and filling for the week.

title: Used Bookstore Haul
flavor: A dusty shop has a sale and you haul home armfuls of strange, inspiring books.

title: Landlord Won’t Fix It
flavor: A leak, a draft, a weird noise—your landlord shrugs and says “next month.”

title: Neighbor Potluck
flavor: The building hosts a potluck; you leave full, buzzing with stories and ideas.

title: Odd Jobs Around Home
flavor: You fix shelves, patch walls, and tinker; the place looks better and so does your skill.

title: Sick Day in Bed
flavor: You call it, stay under the covers, and let your body and brain reset a little.
